name: Cretaceous Carnage
description:
Cretaceous Carnage is a dinosaur fighting game created in 48 hours by Pixel Barons. 

  • Four unique characters 
  • Two players local
  • Play against ai opponents

This game was made in a jam and is released in its current state. We are considering doing updates to the game if there is a good response. Let us know your feedback and suggestions! What dinosaur do you want to play as next?



www.pixelbarons.com
